actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide competition in the domestic crude oil market.
short_title: Crude Oil Marketing Competition Act of 1979

summary.text: Crude Oil Marketing Competition Act of 1979 - Directs the President to remove from any regulation, ruling, or interpretation, under the specified provision of the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, any provision regarding the supplier/purchaser relationship which restricts competition.

titles.title: Crude Oil Marketing Competition Act of 1979
A bill to provide competition in the domestic crude oil market.
